Sept. 9, 2007 D Hardraw Scar (Class B)
Hardraw Scar (Class B) 20 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar-class-b
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Awards for fourth and ungraded bands. 1 £125 and the Charltons Estate Agency Trophy: Otley Brass Band 2 £100 and the Ray Needham Rose Bowl: Elland Silver Youth Band 3 £75 and the Hawes & High Abbotside PC Chairman's Trophy: Friendly (Sowerby Bridge) Band 4 £50 and the Walter Fox memorial trophy: Swinton & District Excelsior Band 5 £25 and the Kirkby Lonsdale BB Trophy: Leyburn Band.
April 14, 2011, 4:10 p.m. April 14, 2011, 4:20 p.m.

2 Elland Youth Band Samantha Harrison
